messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
Find whoever I contacted last, change his cell to +10293847563.

messages.name: search_contacts
messages.content: ValueError: No search criteria are given. At least one search criteria should be provided among ('person_id', 'name', 'phone_number', 'relationship', 'is_self')

I need more information to find the contact you referenced as "whoever I contacted last," since the system doesn't track interaction history—only name, phone, relationship, and self/non-self. Could you please provide any of the following so I can identify the right entry?

- The person's name (or part of it)  
- Their old phone number  
- Their relationship to you  
- Or the person_id if you happen to know it

Once I have that detail, I can update their cell number to +1 029-384-7563.
Sorry, I don't have any of that info. Maybe check sent messages?

I don’t have access to messaging-logs or sent-message history. The only thing I can search is the contact database, which stores the person’s name, phone number, relationship, and an internal ID. Without at least a fragment of a name, a portion of the old phone number, or an indication of the relationship, I can’t identify which contact to update.

If you can remember even a first name, the first few digits of the old number, or how the person is related to you, I can perform a search and then make the change.
I'm really not sure. Maybe try using any tools you have that might help?

I’ve already tried the only tool available—the contact search—but it requires at least one clue (name, phone, relationship, ID). Without any search terms it returns nothing, and I have no access to call logs or messaging data.

Unfortunately, with the tools at my disposal I cannot locate the contact you last reached out to unless you provide at least a small piece of information, such as:

- A first or last name (or even part of it)  
- The beginning digits of their current/old number  
- Their relationship to you (“work colleague,” “Mom,” “friend,” etc.)  

If you remember anything at all, I’ll be able to look them up and update their phone number to +1-029-384-7563.
No worries. Let's just leave it then.
Alright, feel free to come back whenever you remember anything about that contact!
